title: How to balance Gnar and Frozen Mallet at the same time
body:
Reduce the slow for ranged champions from 30% to 20%. 

Bam, now it's not a good rush on ranged champions and we don't have to nerf yet another bruiser item because ranged champions abuse them.

It's hard to argue that both Rylais and Frozen Mallet are healthy gameplay items. They double dip into stats and have passives that make dealing with anyone who rushes it impossible to deal with in 1v1 situations. 

In a perfect world, I'd prefer to see them become actives where they grant decaying slows for like 8-10 seconds.

At least with rylais it's gated by cool down of spells (some champs like Karthus can bypass this, but applies to most) and most mages are unable to deal very much damage if they build almost all tank items like most FM abusers. FM is also much more reliable, creating totally binary situations where you pretty much either win the fight or die.
